segments.text: I can't believe what I'm witnessing here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely out of touch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing out of that sink, literally flooding the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is submerged, yet she shows no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Is she really that absorbed in polishing a single plate?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating to see such blatant unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, her children are engaging in mischief right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is risking a serious fall for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she have any spatial awareness at all?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden outside just highlights the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to tell her to turn off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause so much damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout at her to look around!
segments.speaker: PAR
